readable.title: 3090600019_8808fe7a9d
readable.content: A man and a woman dressed as a prisoner and sexy police officer . A man dresses as a prisoner and a woman dressed as a cop on a sidewalk . An attractive police lady and a jailbird pose for a photo . Man stands next to woman dressed up as a fake police officer . There is a woman in a sexy cop 's uniform and a guy dressed as a prisoner , standing outdoors .
